mil7.5.3:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘undurassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.3:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, unduro itocito ca vicaranto aharupasisako yeva carati;
mil7.5.3:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena itocito ca vicarantena yoniso manasikarupasisakeneva bhavitabbam.
mil7.5.3:1.4: Idam, maharaja, undurassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
